name: Lycanthropy
description: Lycanthropy is a curse that transforms a humanoid into a lycanthrope -- a creature that can shift between humanoid and beast forms. The curse is typically transmitted through a bite from a lycanthrope.

transmission.method: A humanoid creature can be afflicted with lycanthropy after being bitten by a lycanthrope, or through a curse or other magical means.
transmission.savingThrow: The DM may allow a Constitution saving throw (DC varies by lycanthrope type) to resist the curse after being bitten.
transmission.onsetTime: The curse takes hold on the next full moon, unless removed before then.

types.name: Werewolf
types.damageImmunity: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

abilityModifications.note: Strength becomes 15 if not already higher

traits: Keen Hearing and Smell (Advantage on Perception checks relying on hearing or smell)
Speed 30 ft. (40 ft. in wolf form)
actions: Bite (hybrid or wolf form only): melee weapon attack, Piercing damage, DC 12 Constitution save or be cursed

types.damageImmunity: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

abilityModifications.note: Dexterity becomes 15 if not already higher

traits: Keen Smell (Advantage on Perception checks relying on smell)
actions: Bite (hybrid or rat form only): melee weapon attack, Piercing damage, DC 11 Constitution save or be cursed

types.name: Wereboar
types.damageImmunity: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

abilityModifications.note: Strength becomes 17 if not already higher

traits: Charge (if the wereboar moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and hits with tusks, extra 2d6 Slashing, DC 13 Strength save or be knocked Prone)
Relentless (if reduced to 0 HP, drops to 1 HP instead, once per day)
actions: Tusks (hybrid or boar form only): melee weapon attack, Slashing damage, DC 12 Constitution save or be cursed

types.name: Weretiger
types.damageImmunity: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

abilityModifications.note: Strength becomes 17 if not already higher

traits: Keen Hearing and Smell (Advantage on Perception checks relying on hearing or smell)
Pounce (if moves 15 ft. straight toward creature and hits with claw, DC 14 Strength save or be knocked Prone, bonus bite if Prone)
actions: Bite (hybrid or tiger form only): melee weapon attack, Piercing damage, DC 13 Constitution save or be cursed

types.name: Werebear
types.damageImmunity: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

abilityModifications.note: Strength becomes 19 if not already higher

traits: Keen Smell (Advantage on Perception checks relying on smell)

curing.notes: Remove Curse can end the curse of lycanthropy. If the character was born a natural lycanthrope, Remove Curse cannot cure the condition. A natural lycanthrope can be cured only by a Wish spell. If a character embraces the curse, they may lose their character to the DM's control.
